Class Timetable

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Timetable
public class Timetable
extends java.lang.Object

Timetable Class, written by Michael Abbott. Does all the work involved in splitting up the text file into trains, journeys and train status objects. Also used to return possible journeys ans stuff.
